Nutrition facts: Ghee:Â It contains fat and minor portion of protein Masala Dosa with coconut chutney: Vitamin : A & C Minerals : Iron, calicium, sodium and protein This is one of my favorite Dosa varieties in South India ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³Â if you are checking for any other dosa variety you can click below links Plain Dosa Masala Dosa Onion ðŸ¥• Uttappam Rava Dosa Rice Flour Dosa/Instant Veg Dosa|| Breakfast Recipe Karam Dosa Green gram Dosa/ Pesara Attu/ Moong Dal Dosa Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients: Dosa Batter:Â Dosa Batter/ South Indian pancake Batter Podi :Â Idly/ Dosa podi / Powder ðŸ˜‹ || Tamilnadu recipe Aloo Masala:Â Potato Masala/ Aloo Masala Coconut chutney:Â Coriander Coconut Chutney / Kothimeera Kobbari Chutney Ghee - 1 tb sp Procedure:
  • Heat tawa / Dosa tawa on medium heat
  • Sprinkle water to test tawa is hot or not
  • Take one big ladle Dosa Batter and pour at center of the tawa
  • Spread batter in circular motion with ladle
  • Either thin / thick dosa
  • Sprinkle Idly/ Dosa Podi equally on it
  • Apply one tsp ghee around and on dosa
  • Close with lid and cook 30 secs
  • Add 3 tb sp aloo Masala at center of dosa when downsides of dosa color changes to golden brown
  • Fold left and right sides of dosa as shown in picture below
  • Flip it gently
  • Serve it hot with coconut chutney/ sambar
